Class drinkInfoContainerController

java.lang.Object
drinkInfoContainerController
public class drinkInfoContainerController extends Object
Class responsible for creaing the drink information cards/compomenent

This class is responsible for making the drink information card that will be uploaded the order summary page. It will contain information of the drink ordered such as the name of the drink, the price, quantity, ice level, sweetness level, and toppings of the drink.
